messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/4/2003 3:27:26 AM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-> "
> each So I called out "you go ahead and take it", and
> this absolutely beautiful bald older man, with the accent replied "are
> you sure? ..Thank you very much" and pulled in. Then I realized who it
> was

Ooooh. Now I find him incredibly sexy.

Ren, wondering why all of her ding-dang messages are coming through with a
line struck through them!!!!!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
